# Select a text

```{r}
manuscript_meta %>% 
  select(dating, everything()) %>% 
  mutate(dating = str_c("<a href='/manuscripts/", catalogue_id, "/'>", dating, "</a>")) %>% 
  datatable(rownames = FALSE, escape = FALSE, class = 'row-border', options = list(pageLength = 10))
```
